title: My Rp Art
body:
Hello to whoever is reading this, I have made 6 pictures for rp art, all this I ask for is 61 rp please, i really want blood moon tresh and i don't have the money to get another $5 in rp, thank you very much and have a nice day!!! :) and by the way please do not take this down because i have seen that the people in riot who made the rp art video said to post the rp art here.

1. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DEUoexRXUAM8l9Q.jpg

2. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DEUof9VXkAU5v-H.jpg

3. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DEUodfxXoAA7llW.jpg 

4. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DA2_ckYXoAERIUm.jpg

5. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DA2YjhVXYAEwZ5D.jpg

6. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DEUrTneXUAIKcgC.jpg

replies.body: Hey there again Yummy! Those are some nice sketches, I especially like the Draven one, but I remember tossing you some Gift Art RP only about a month ago. Rp art is something we love getting, but the RP Gift is only meant to be a little boost towards your next purchase every once and awhile. I won't be able to give it out again this time, so hold onto that art for sometime down the down!
